name: angular-to-react-interview
description: Interview template for migrating Angular to React

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:angular" "npm run dev:react" "npm run dev:server"
scripts.dev:angular: echo 'AngularJS app - run npm run build && npm start' && npm run build:angular
scripts.build: npm run build:angular && npm run build:react
scripts.build:angular: mkdir -p public/angular/browser && rm -rf public/angular/browser/* && cp -r angular-app/src/* public/angular/browser/
scripts.build:react: cd react-app && npm run build && mkdir -p ../public/react && cp -r build/* ../public/react/
scripts.setup: npm install &&npm run setup:angular && npm run setup:react && npm run build && npm run dev
scripts.setup:angular: echo 'AngularJS setup complete - no dependencies needed'
